dataList.name: Bestowed Mission
dataList.desc: เริ่มการเผชิญหน้า: ได้รับ [WeighedMurderousIntend]

dataList.name: Strider [Mao]
dataList.desc: When attacking targets with slower Speed than this unit's, สร้าง +1 more [Burst] or [Burst] Count and deal +10% damage

dataList.name: Vigor [Mao]
dataList.desc: On Hit against enemy with [BurstAgility]: สร้าง +2 [Burst] Count on the target (6 times per turn)

dataList.name: Dominator [Mao]
dataList.desc: On Skill Use, if this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 2 or more, แต้มเหรียญ +1

dataList.name: The Big Brother
dataList.desc:
เริ่มเทิร์น: all allies, รวมถึงตัวละครนี้, heal 10 SP
Take -20% damage from [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], [Sinking]

dataList.name: Vengeance Tattoo
dataList.desc: Every time a Middle ally is killed in this encounter, ได้รับ 1 [AttackUp] (สูงสุด 5)

dataList.name: Deeper in the World of Bristly
dataList.desc: If this unit loses 2 Clashes, ได้รับ 6 [DefenseDown] ในเทิร์นถัดไป

dataList.name: The Book of Vengeance
dataList.desc:
When this unit or its ally is hit, สร้าง 1 [MiddleFingerBook] against the attacker, then ได้รับ 1 [AttackUp] ในเทิร์นถัดไป (สูงสุด 5 per turn)
- When an allied unit from The Middle is killed by a Skill, สร้าง 2 additional [MiddleFingerBook] against the attacker

dataList.name: Wounded in Battle
dataList.desc: Begins Encounter with 40% less HP (including Parts)

dataList.name: Brush it Off
dataList.desc: When in panic, recover from panic at the start of the ในเทิร์นถัดไป and reset SP to 0.
